tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pledges (
  pledge_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  pledge_amount DECIMAL,
  pledge_date TIMESTAMP,
  fulfilled BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE UserRewards (
    user_reward_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    reward_id INT NOT NULL,
    points_used INT NOT NULL,
    redeemed_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
